title: I think Azir is going to see a lot of pro play next season.
body:
I'm by no means the best Azir, not even sure I'm a decent one, and I'm not basing my opinions off of how well I do in matches, but the potential i see for plays. I know this cuz I've played a buttload  of him in the last few weeks and I knew if I were a better player, I'd be unstoppable with him.

Azir in his current state is gonna wreck in the current months when actual good players pick him up.
